remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不会缓存的已呈现的内容和对象。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态内容和场景中的画笔的使用都不发生改变的情况下，不缓存带来一个好处，因为这可节省视频内存。In static scenarios where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当以非静态方法的默认行为使用具有静态内容的画笔[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新呈现画笔的整个内容每一帧，即使内容不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render the entire content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，这将会发生时静态或映射到旋转 3D 对象的图面。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现的静态内容可以对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过设置附加属性上缓存的画笔，可以通过使用缓存的版平铺的画笔对象提高性能。By setting the attached property on the brush to Cache, you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 并属性值是相对大小值，确定何时应更改而重新生成对象。The and property values are relative size values that determine when the object should be regenerated due to changes in scale. 例如，通过设置属性设置为 2.0 中，为缓存仅需要其大小超过当前缓存的大小的两倍时重新生成。For example, by setting the property to 2.0, the cache for the only needs to be regenerated when its size exceeds twice the size of the current cache. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a .
